html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06202024-05-31ECCC, HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Products Containing Mercury Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PRODUCTS CONTAINING MERCURY REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the import and manufacture of certain lamps for general lighting purposes; (2) prohibit the use of catalysts in the manufacturing of polyurethane and other products; (3) prohibit bulk dental amalgam powders; (4) prohibit the import and manufacture of high-pressure sodium vapour lams and metal halide lamps used for general lighting; (5) make consequential and administrative amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0109 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the PRODUCTS CONTAINING MERCURY REGULATIONS in order to (1) prohibit the import and manufacture of certain lamps for general lighting purposes; (2) prohibit the use of catalysts in the manufacturing of polyurethane and other products; (3) prohibit bulk dental amalgam powders; (4) prohibit the import and manufacture of high-pressure sodium vapour lams and metal halide lamps used for general lighting; (5) make consequential and administrative amendments.
